structure.unit: Powers And Duties Of Cities And Towns

law.catch_line: Accessibility Of Lockup To Police; Penalty For Refusing Access
law.text: Such lockups shall at all reasonable hours be accessible to the state police, sheriffs, constables and police officers for any legal and proper use; and a keeper thereof neglecting to keep it so accessible, or refusing to said officers the use of the same, shall be punished by a fine of not less than five nor more than twenty dollars.
